contest-event.event-date:
June 28, 1864 D Society of Oddfellows Contest (Cornwall)
Society of Oddfellows Contest (Cornwall) 0 Set Test and Own Choice
society-of-oddfellows-contest
None
Faust [Gounod, unknown arranger]
Pendarves, Camborne 7 bands entered, 5 competed
Each band played an own choice:- St Day - Tancredi overture. Camborne - Italian Girl in Algiers overture. St Just - Il Trovatore selection. Townsend - La Muette selection. Hayle - unknown
Jan. 29, 2012, 12:06 p.m. Nov. 9, 2015, 2:15 p.m.
1 St Day Amateur Band T. Cara Tancredi - overture (unknown arranger)
2 Duke of Cornwall's Rifles (Camborne) Band E. Dunn L'italiana in Algeri - overture [unknown arranger]
3 20th Duke of Cornwall's Rifles (St Just) H. C. Smith Il Trovatore [unknown arranger]
4 Townsend Band J. Bettens La Muette de Portici (Masaniello) [unknown arranger]
5 Duke of Cornwall's Artillery (Hayle) Band S. Stevens
